title: teLLat-teLindiDum
sahitya:
teLLat-teLindiDum aruLE un cittattil kuDikoNDa poruLE


anupallavi

  kaLLak-kAma mayakkam koLLai koLLAdunnai kaN vizhittiDin oru puNNiya jyOtiyAi


caraNam    Anava mAyattai aDiyuDan pOkkiya andak-karaNattaiyE
nena UTTiDin uNmai arivAgi uLLattirp-pErinba veLLam adAgiyE
